thread.title: 森友学園に激安で大阪の国有地売却 名誉校長は安倍昭恵氏「日本初で唯一の神道の小学校」
thread.title_full: 森友学園に激安で大阪の国有地売却 名誉校長は安倍昭恵氏「日本初で唯一の神道の小学校」

author: 泉谷由梨子
title: 森友学園に激安で大阪の国有地売却 名誉校長は安倍昭恵氏「日本初で唯一の神道の小学校」
text:   Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe (C) poses for photographers with guests during a garden party to enjoy cherry blossoms hosted by the premier in Tokyo on April 9, 2016. Some 16,000 invited people from various fields gathered the annual spring party. / AFP PHOTO / TORU YAMANAKA Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, center with a pink tie, chats with Japanese artists, entertainers, athletes and other guests during a cherry blossom viewing party hosted by Abe at Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden in Tokyo, Saturday, April 9, 2016. (AP Photo/Eugene Hoshiko) 首相主催の「桜を見る会」で招待客らと写真に納まる安倍晋三首相（中央）＝2016年4月9日午前、東京・新宿御苑 Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe (C) poses for photographers with members of Japanese idol group Momoiro Clover Z and child actors during a garden party to enjoy cherry blossoms hosted by the premier in Tokyo on April 9, 2016. Some 16,000 invited people from various fields gathered the annual spring party. / AFP PHOTO / TORU YAMANAKA Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, center, poses with members of Japanese girl pop group NGT48 during a cherry blossom viewing party hosted by Abe at Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden in Tokyo, Saturday, April 9, 2016. (AP Photo/Eugene Hoshiko) Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, fourth right, chats with Japanese musician DAIGO, third right, as he stands with artists, entertainers, athletes and other guests during a cherry blossom viewing party hosted by Abe at Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden in Tokyo, Saturday, April 9, 2016. (AP Photo/Eugene Hoshiko) Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, center left with a pink tie, and his wife Akie, center right in a light blue suit, pose for a group photo with Japanese artists, entertainers, athletes and other guests during a cherry blossom viewing party hosted by Abe at Tokyo's Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden in Tokyo, Saturday, April 9, 2016. (AP Photo/Eugene Hoshiko)  シェア
